body.content:
Dearest greetings

I am contacting you with tears and sorrows.My name is Helen Richard from
Ivory Coast I am the only daughter of my parents.My father and mother died
of Coronavirus on their missionary tour in Italy. My late father was a
senior pastor in one of the biggest churches in my country.

My late father deposited a consignment box in a security company containing
($1.500.000) One Million Five Hundred Thousand dollars for safe keeping
during the civil war for presidential re-election in my country.

I am seeking for your assistant to receive my inheritance fund for me as my
beneficiary from the security company and bring me to your country to start
a good living and continue my education as I am only 22 years.

I am presently in a refugee camp in a neighbouring country to secure my
life as I escaped from my family members who wanted to kill me to claim my
late parents properties.

I hope you will bring me out of this terrible condition? We can talk on
whatsapp video call to see each other in person for proper identification
.Thanks for your sympathy and may God bless you.

Best regards
Helen Richard
